title: Innovative Science Curriculum Design Through Collaborative Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and educational methodologies
context.additional_context: Exploring innovative science curriculum design using collaborative teaching methods for pre-service and in-service teachers, with community-linked projects to enhance practical competencies

learning_goals: Design science curricula with at least three innovative approaches applying collaborative pedagogy
Plan and execute community-linked PBL projects while evaluating their applicability in educational settings
Enhance instructional design competencies by over 20% through peer feedback and reflective practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
